keyword: calories in starbucks egg white bites
title: Calories in Starbucks Egg White Bites
meta_description: Learn calories in Starbucks egg white bites per serving (2 bites), including protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick nutrition tweaks for your order.
h1: Calories in Starbucks Egg White Bites
assumptions: Sous vide egg white bites with roasted red pepper, spinach, and feta cheese; standard Starbucks serving of 2 bites (130 g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact recipe, and customizations; check Starbucks app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of 2 Starbucks egg white bites provides ~170 kcal and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Bacon & Gruyere flavor instead of egg white
Add 1 slice turkey bacon per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one Starbucks egg white bite?
faqs.a: About 85 kcal per single bite, based on the 170 kcal serving of 2.

faqs.q: What is the protein in Starbucks egg white bites?
faqs.a: 12 g protein per serving of 2 bites, mostly from egg whites.

faqs.q: Are Starbucks egg white bites low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, 9 g carbs per 2 bites, with 0 g fiber and 3 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Starbucks egg white bites?
faqs.a: 380 mg sodium per serving of 2 bites, mainly from feta and seasonings.

faqs.q: Can I customize Starbucks egg white bites for fewer calories?
faqs.a: Request no cheese or modifications; this can reduce calories by 20-50 kcal per serving.
